      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-509" id="section-509"></a>
</div>
<p>Get a promise resolved when queues of a certain type
are emptied (fx is the type by default)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	promise: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> type, obj </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> tmp,
			count = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
			defer = jQuery.Deferred(),
			elements = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>,
			i = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.length,
			resolve = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !( --count ) ) {
					defer.resolveWith( elements, [ elements ] );
				}
			};

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> type !== <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> ) {
			obj = type;
			type = <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span>;
		}
		type = type || <span class="hljs-string">"fx"</span>;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( i-- ) {
			tmp = dataPriv.get( elements[ i ], type + <span class="hljs-string">"queueHooks"</span> );
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( tmp &amp;&amp; tmp.empty ) {
				count++;
				tmp.empty.add( resolve );
			}
		}
		resolve();
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> defer.promise( obj );
	}
} );
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> pnum = ( <span class="hljs-regexp">/[+-]?(?:\d*\.|)\d+(?:[eE][+-]?\d+|)/</span> ).source;

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">adjustCSS</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, prop, valueParts, tween </span>) </span>{

			} :

				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jQuery.css( elem, prop, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );
			},

		unit = valueParts &amp;&amp; valueParts[ <span class="hljs-number">3</span> ] || ( jQuery.cssNumber[ prop ] ? <span class="hljs-string">""</span> : <span class="hljs-string">"px"</span> ),

</pre>

      </tr>

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( initialInUnit &amp;&amp; initialInUnit[ <span class="hljs-number">3</span> ] !== unit ) {

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">			jQuery.style( elem, prop, initialInUnit + unit );

				maxIterations = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
			}
			initialInUnit = initialInUnit / scale;

		}

		initialInUnit = initialInUnit * <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
		jQuery.style( elem, prop, initialInUnit + unit );

			+valueParts[ <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ];

			tween.unit = unit;
			tween.start = initialInUnit;
			tween.end = adjusted;
		}
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> adjusted;
}


<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> defaultDisplayMap = {};

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">getDefaultDisplay</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> temp,
		doc = elem.ownerDocument,
		nodeName = elem.nodeName,
		display = defaultDisplayMap[ nodeName ];

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( display ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> display;
	}

	temp = doc.body.appendChild( doc.createElement( nodeName ) );
	display = jQuery.css( temp, <span class="hljs-string">"display"</span> );

	temp.parentNode.removeChild( temp );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( display === <span class="hljs-string">"none"</span> ) {
		display = <span class="hljs-string">"block"</span>;
	}
	defaultDisplayMap[ nodeName ] = display;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> display;
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">showHide</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elements, show </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> display, elem,
		values = [],
		index = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		length = elements.length;

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-521" id="section-521"></a>
</div>
<p>Determine new display value for elements that need to change</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( ; index &lt; length; index++ ) {
		elem = elements[ index ];
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !elem.style ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span>;
		}

		display = elem.style.display;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( show ) {

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-522" id="section-522"></a>
</div>
<p>Since we force visibility upon cascade-hidden elements, an immediate (and slow)
check is required in this first loop unless we have a nonempty display value (either
inline or about-to-be-restored)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( display === <span class="hljs-string">"none"</span> ) {
				values[ index ] = dataPriv.get( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"display"</span> ) || <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>;
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !values[ index ] ) {
					elem.style.display = <span class="hljs-string">""</span>;
				}
			}
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( elem.style.display === <span class="hljs-string">""</span> &amp;&amp; isHiddenWithinTree( elem ) ) {
				values[ index ] = getDefaultDisplay( elem );
			}
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( display !== <span class="hljs-string">"none"</span> ) {
				values[ index ] = <span class="hljs-string">"none"</span>;

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-523" id="section-523"></a>
</div>
<p>Remember what we're overwriting</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">				dataPriv.set( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"display"</span>, display );
			}
		}
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-524" id="section-524"></a>

<p>Set the display of the elements in a second loop to avoid constant reflow</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( index = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; index &lt; length; index++ ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( values[ index ] != <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> ) {
			elements[ index ].style.display = values[ index ];
		}
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elements;
}

jQuery.fn.extend( {
	<span class="hljs-attr">show</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> showHide( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">hide</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> showHide( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">toggle</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> state </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> state === <span class="hljs-string">"boolean"</span> ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> state ? <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.show() : <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.hide();
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( isHiddenWithinTree( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ) ) {
				jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ).show();
			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
				jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ).hide();
			}
		} );
	}
} );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
		l = elems.length;

			<span class="hljs-string">"globalEval"</span>,
			!refElements || dataPriv.get( refElements[ i ], <span class="hljs-string">"globalEval"</span> )
		);
	}
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">returnTrue</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">returnFalse</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-548" id="section-548"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: IE &lt;=9 - 11+
focus() and blur() are asynchronous, except when they are no-op.
So expect focus to be synchronous when the element is already active,
and blur to be synchronous when the element is not already active.
(focus and blur are always synchronous in other supported browsers,
this just defines when we can count on it).</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">expectSync</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, type </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ( elem === safeActiveElement() ) === ( type === <span class="hljs-string">"focus"</span> );
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-549" id="section-549"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: IE &lt;=9 only
Accessing document.activeElement can throw unexpectedly
https://bugs.jquery.com/ticket/13393</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">safeActiveElement</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.activeElement;
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> ( err ) { }
}

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-558" id="section-558"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Helper functions for managing events -- not part of the public interface.
Props to Dean Edwards' addEvent library for many of the ideas.</p>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">jQuery.event = {

	<span class="hljs-attr">global</span>: {},

	<span class="hljs-attr">add</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, types, handler, data, selector </span>) </span>{

		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> handleObjIn, eventHandle, tmp,
			events, t, handleObj,
			special, handlers, type, namespaces, origType,
			elemData = dataPriv.get( elem );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-559" id="section-559"></a>
</div>
<p>Only attach events to objects that accept data</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !acceptData( elem ) ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>;
		}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-560" id="section-560"></a>

          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( handler.handler ) {
			handleObjIn = handler;
			handler = handleObjIn.handler;
			selector = handleObjIn.selector;
		}

					}
				}
			}

          <pre class="javascript">	remove: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, types, handler, selector, mappedTypes </span>) </span>{

		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> j, origCount, tmp,

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-576" id="section-576"></a>

          <pre class="javascript">		types = ( types || <span class="hljs-string">""</span> ).match( rnothtmlwhite ) || [ <span class="hljs-string">""</span> ];

		<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( t-- ) {
			tmp = rtypenamespace.exec( types[ t ] ) || [];

        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-577" id="section-577"></a>
</div>
<p>Unbind all events (on this namespace, if provided) for the element</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !type ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( type <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> events ) {
					jQuery.event.remove( elem, type + types[ t ], handler, selector, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );
				}
				<span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span>;
			}

			special = jQuery.event.special[ type ] || {};
			type = ( selector ? special.delegateType : special.bindType ) || type;
			handlers = events[ type ] || [];
			tmp = tmp[ <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ] &amp;&amp;
				<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">RegExp</span>( <span class="hljs-string">"(^|\\.)"</span> + namespaces.join( <span class="hljs-string">"\\.(?:.*\\.|)"</span> ) + <span class="hljs-string">"(\\.|$)"</span> );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-578" id="section-578"></a>
</div>
<p>Remove matching events</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			origCount = j = handlers.length;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( j-- ) {
				handleObj = handlers[ j ];

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ( mappedTypes || origType === handleObj.origType ) &amp;&amp;
					( !handler || handler.guid === handleObj.guid ) &amp;&amp;
					( !tmp || tmp.test( handleObj.namespace ) ) &amp;&amp;
					( !selector || selector === handleObj.selector ||
						selector === <span class="hljs-string">"**"</span> &amp;&amp; handleObj.selector ) ) {
					handlers.splice( j, <span class="hljs-number">1</span> );

					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( handleObj.selector ) {
						handlers.delegateCount--;
					}
					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( special.remove ) {
						special.remove.call( elem, handleObj );
					}
				}
			}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-579" id="section-579"></a>
</div>
<p>Remove generic event handler if we removed something and no more handlers exist
(avoids potential for endless recursion during removal of special event handlers)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( origCount &amp;&amp; !handlers.length ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !special.teardown ||
					special.teardown.call( elem, namespaces, elemData.handle ) === <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> ) {

					jQuery.removeEvent( elem, type, elemData.handle );
				}

				<span class="hljs-keyword">delete</span> events[ type ];
			}
		}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

			dataPriv.remove( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"handle events"</span> );
		}
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">dispatch</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> nativeEvent </span>) </span>{

		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i, j, ret, matched, handleObj, handlerQueue,
			args = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Array</span>( <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>.length ),

      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-582" id="section-582"></a>
</div>
<p>Use the fix-ed jQuery.Event rather than the (read-only) native event</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		args[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] = event;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( i = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; i &lt; <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>.length; i++ ) {
			args[ i ] = <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>[ i ];
		}

		event.delegateTarget = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;

        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-583" id="section-583"></a>
</div>
<p>Call the preDispatch hook for the mapped type, and let it bail if desired</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( special.preDispatch &amp;&amp; special.preDispatch.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, event ) === <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>;
		}

        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-584" id="section-584"></a>
</div>
<p>Determine handlers</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		handlerQueue = jQuery.event.handlers.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, event, handlers );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-585" id="section-585"></a>
</div>
<p>Run delegates first; they may want to stop propagation beneath us</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( ( matched = handlerQueue[ i++ ] ) &amp;&amp; !event.isPropagationStopped() ) {
			event.currentTarget = matched.elem;

			j = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( ( handleObj = matched.handlers[ j++ ] ) &amp;&amp;
				!event.isImmediatePropagationStopped() ) {

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-586" id="section-586"></a>
</div>
<p>If the event is namespaced, then each handler is only invoked if it is
specially universal or its namespaces are a superset of the event's.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !event.rnamespace || handleObj.namespace === <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> ||
					event.rnamespace.test( handleObj.namespace ) ) {

					event.handleObj = handleObj;
					event.data = handleObj.data;

					ret = ( ( jQuery.event.special[ handleObj.origType ] || {} ).handle ||
						handleObj.handler ).apply( matched.elem, args );

					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ret !== <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span> ) {
						<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ( event.result = ret ) === <span class="hljs-literal">false</span> ) {
							event.preventDefault();
							event.stopPropagation();
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-587" id="section-587"></a>
</div>
<p>Call the postDispatch hook for the mapped type</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( special.postDispatch ) {
			special.postDispatch.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, event );
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> event.result;
	},

(focus or blur), assume that the surrogate already propagated from triggering the
native event and prevent that from happening again here.

bubbling surrogate propagates <em>after</em> the non-bubbling base), but that seems
less bad than duplication.</p>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-627" id="section-627"></a>
</div>
<p>jQuery.Event is based on DOM3 Events as specified by the ECMAScript Language Binding
https://www.w3.org/TR/2003/WD-DOM-Level-3-Events-20030331/ecma-script-binding.html</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">jQuery.Event.prototype = {
	<span class="hljs-attr">constructor</span>: jQuery.Event,
	<span class="hljs-attr">isDefaultPrevented</span>: returnFalse,
	<span class="hljs-attr">isPropagationStopped</span>: returnFalse,
	<span class="hljs-attr">isImmediatePropagationStopped</span>: returnFalse,
	<span class="hljs-attr">isSimulated</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,

	<span class="hljs-attr">preventDefault</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> e = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.originalEvent;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.isDefaultPrevented = returnTrue;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( e &amp;&amp; !<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.isSimulated ) {
			e.preventDefault();
		}
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">stopPropagation</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> e = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.originalEvent;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.isPropagationStopped = returnTrue;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( e &amp;&amp; !<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.isSimulated ) {
			e.stopPropagation();
		}
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">stopImmediatePropagation</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> e = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.originalEvent;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.isImmediatePropagationStopped = returnTrue;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( e &amp;&amp; !<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.isSimulated ) {
			e.stopImmediatePropagation();
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.stopPropagation();
	}
};

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-636" id="section-636"></a>
</div>
<p>Create mouseenter/leave events using mouseover/out and event-time checks
so that event delegation works in jQuery.
Do the same for pointerenter/pointerleave and pointerover/pointerout</p>
<p>Support: Safari 7 only
Safari sends mouseenter too often; see:
https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=470258
for the description of the bug (it existed in older Chrome versions as well).</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">jQuery.each( {
	<span class="hljs-attr">mouseenter</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"mouseover"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-attr">mouseleave</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"mouseout"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-attr">pointerenter</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"pointerover"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-attr">pointerleave</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"pointerout"</span>
}, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> orig, fix </span>) </span>{
	jQuery.event.special[ orig ] = {
		<span class="hljs-attr">delegateType</span>: fix,
		<span class="hljs-attr">bindType</span>: fix,

		<span class="hljs-attr">handle</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> event </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> ret,
				target = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>,
				related = event.relatedTarget,
				handleObj = event.handleObj;

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">

NB: No relatedTarget if the mouse left/entered the browser window</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !related || ( related !== target &amp;&amp; !jQuery.contains( target, related ) ) ) {
				event.type = handleObj.origType;
				ret = handleObj.handler.apply( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span> );
				event.type = fix;
			}
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ret;
		}
	};
} );

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">manipulationTarget</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, content </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( nodeName( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"table"</span> ) &amp;&amp;
		nodeName( content.nodeType !== <span class="hljs-number">11</span> ? content : content.firstChild, <span class="hljs-string">"tr"</span> ) ) {

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jQuery( elem ).children( <span class="hljs-string">"tbody"</span> )[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] || elem;

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-644" id="section-644"></a>
</div>
<p>Replace/restore the type attribute of script elements for safe DOM manipulation</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">disableScript</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{
	elem.type = ( elem.getAttribute( <span class="hljs-string">"type"</span> ) !== <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> ) + <span class="hljs-string">"/"</span> + elem.type;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem;
}
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">restoreScript</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ( elem.type || <span class="hljs-string">""</span> ).slice( <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span> ) === <span class="hljs-string">"true/"</span> ) {
		elem.type = elem.type.slice( <span class="hljs-number">5</span> );
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
		elem.removeAttribute( <span class="hljs-string">"type"</span> );
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem;
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">cloneCopyEvent</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> src, dest </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i, l, type, pdataOld, udataOld, udataCur, events;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( dest.nodeType !== <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>;
	}

      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-645" id="section-645"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Copy private data: events, handlers, etc.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( dataPriv.hasData( src ) ) {
		pdataOld = dataPriv.get( src );
		events = pdataOld.events;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( events ) {
			dataPriv.remove( dest, <span class="hljs-string">"handle events"</span> );

			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( type <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> events ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, l = events[ type ].length; i &lt; l; i++ ) {
					jQuery.event.add( dest, type, events[ type ][ i ] );
				}
			}
		}
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">remove</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, selector, keepData </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> node,
		nodes = selector ? jQuery.filter( selector, elem ) : elem,
		i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( ; ( node = nodes[ i ] ) != <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>; i++ ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !keepData &amp;&amp; node.nodeType === <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ) {
			jQuery.cleanData( getAll( node ) );
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( node.parentNode ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( keepData &amp;&amp; isAttached( node ) ) {
				setGlobalEval( getAll( node, <span class="hljs-string">"script"</span> ) );
			}
			node.parentNode.removeChild( node );
		}
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem;
}

	<span class="hljs-attr">html</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value </span>) </span>{

some versions of this test; make sure not to make it pass there!</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.get = hookFn ).apply( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span> );
		}
	};
}


<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> cssPrefixes = [ <span class="hljs-string">"Webkit"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"Moz"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"ms"</span> ],
	emptyStyle = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.createElement( <span class="hljs-string">"div"</span> ).style,
	vendorProps = {};

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-698" id="section-698"></a>
</div>
<p>Return a vendor-prefixed property or undefined</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">vendorPropName</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> name </span>) </span>{

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-699" id="section-699"></a>
</div>
<p>Check for vendor prefixed names</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> capName = name[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ].toUpperCase() + name.slice( <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ),
		i = cssPrefixes.length;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( i-- ) {
		name = cssPrefixes[ i ] + capName;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( name <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> emptyStyle ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> name;
		}
	}
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-700" id="section-700"></a>
</div>
<p>Return a potentially-mapped jQuery.cssProps or vendor prefixed property</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">finalPropName</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> name </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> final = jQuery.cssProps[ name ] || vendorProps[ name ];

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( final ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> final;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( name <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> emptyStyle ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> name;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> vendorProps[ name ] = vendorPropName( name ) || name;
}

			}
		},

				value = jQuery.css( elem, dimension );
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> setPositiveNumber( elem, value, subtract );
		}
	};
} );

jQuery.cssHooks.marginLeft = addGetHookIf( support.reliableMarginLeft,
	<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, computed </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( computed ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ( <span class="hljs-built_in">parseFloat</span>( curCSS( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"marginLeft"</span> ) ) ||
				elem.getBoundingClientRect().left -
					swap( elem, { <span class="hljs-attr">marginLeft</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> }, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
						<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem.getBoundingClientRect().left;
					} )
				) + <span class="hljs-string">"px"</span>;
		}
	}
);

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-758" id="section-758"></a>
</div>
<p>These hooks are used by animate to expand properties</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">jQuery.each( {
	<span class="hljs-attr">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
	<span class="hljs-attr">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
	<span class="hljs-attr">border</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Width"</span>
}, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> prefix, suffix </span>) </span>{
	jQuery.cssHooks[ prefix + suffix ] = {
		<span class="hljs-attr">expand</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
				expanded = {},

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-759" id="section-759"></a>
</div>
<p>Assumes a single number if not a string</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">				parts = <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> value === <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> ? value.split( <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> ) : [ value ];

			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( ; i &lt; <span class="hljs-number">4</span>; i++ ) {
				expanded[ prefix + cssExpand[ i ] + suffix ] =
					parts[ i ] || parts[ i - <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ] || parts[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ];
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> expanded;
		}
	};

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( prefix !== <span class="hljs-string">"margin"</span> ) {
		jQuery.cssHooks[ prefix + suffix ].set = setPositiveNumber;
	}
} );

jQuery.fn.extend( {
	<span class="hljs-attr">css</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> name, value </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> access( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, name, value </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> styles, len,
				map = {},
				i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-built_in">Array</span>.isArray( name ) ) {
				styles = getStyles( elem );
				len = name.length;

				<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( ; i &lt; len; i++ ) {
					map[ name[ i ] ] = jQuery.css( elem, name[ i ], <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>, styles );
				}

				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> map;
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value !== <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span> ?
				jQuery.style( elem, name, value ) :
				jQuery.css( elem, name );
		}, name, value, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>.length &gt; <span class="hljs-number">1</span> );
	}
} );


<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">Tween</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, options, prop, end, easing </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Tween.prototype.init( elem, options, prop, end, easing );
}
jQuery.Tween = Tween;

Tween.prototype = {
	<span class="hljs-attr">constructor</span>: Tween,
	<span class="hljs-attr">init</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, options, prop, end, easing, unit </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.elem = elem;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.prop = prop;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.easing = easing || jQuery.easing._default;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.options = options;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.start = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.now = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.cur();
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.end = end;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.unit = unit || ( jQuery.cssNumber[ prop ] ? <span class="hljs-string">""</span> : <span class="hljs-string">"px"</span> );
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">cur</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> hooks = Tween.propHooks[ <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.prop ];

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> hooks &amp;&amp; hooks.get ?
			hooks.get( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ) :
			Tween.propHooks._default.get( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">run</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> percent </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> eased,
			hooks = Tween.propHooks[ <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.prop ];

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.options.duration ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.pos = eased = jQuery.easing[ <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.easing ](
				percent, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.options.duration * percent, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.options.duration
			);
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.pos = eased = percent;
		}
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.now = ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.end - <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.start ) * eased + <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.start;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.options.step ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.options.step.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.elem, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.now, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( hooks &amp;&amp; hooks.set ) {
			hooks.set( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			Tween.propHooks._default.set( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		}
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;
	}
};

Tween.prototype.init.prototype = Tween.prototype;

Tween.propHooks = {
	<span class="hljs-attr">_default</span>: {
		<span class="hljs-attr">get</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> tween </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> result;

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-760" id="section-760"></a>

or when there is no matching style property that exists.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( tween.elem.nodeType !== <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ||

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-761" id="section-761"></a>
</div>
<p>Passing an empty string as a 3rd parameter to .css will automatically
attempt a parseFloat and fallback to a string if the parse fails.
Simple values such as &quot;10px&quot; are parsed to Float;
complex values such as &quot;rotate(1rad)&quot; are returned as-is.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			result = jQuery.css( tween.elem, tween.prop, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-762" id="section-762"></a>

<p>Empty strings, null, undefined and &quot;auto&quot; are converted to 0.</p>

          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> !result || result === <span class="hljs-string">"auto"</span> ? <span class="hljs-number">0</span> : result;
		},

        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>

Use cssHook if its there.
Use .style if available and use plain properties where available.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( jQuery.fx.step[ tween.prop ] ) {
				jQuery.fx.step[ tween.prop ]( tween );
			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( tween.elem.nodeType === <span class="hljs-number">1</span> &amp;&amp; (

					tween.elem.style[ finalPropName( tween.prop ) ] != <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> ) ) {
				jQuery.style( tween.elem, tween.prop, tween.now + tween.unit );
			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
				tween.elem[ tween.prop ] = tween.now;
			}
		}
	}
};

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">schedule</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{

		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.setTimeout( schedule, jQuery.fx.interval );
		}

	}

		attrs[ <span class="hljs-string">"margin"</span> + which ] = attrs[ <span class="hljs-string">"padding"</span> + which ] = type;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( includeWidth ) {
		attrs.opacity = attrs.width = type;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> attrs;
}

</pre>

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">		propTween = createTween( hidden ? dataShow[ prop ] : <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, prop, anim );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !( prop <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> dataShow ) ) {

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( hidden ) {

				propTween.start = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
			}
		}
	}
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">propFilter</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> props, specialEasing </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> index, name, easing, value, hooks;

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-788" id="section-788"></a>
</div>
<p>camelCase, specialEasing and expand cssHook pass</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( index <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> props ) {
		name = camelCase( index );
		easing = specialEasing[ name ];
		value = props[ index ];
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-built_in">Array</span>.isArray( value ) ) {
			easing = value[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ];
			value = props[ index ] = value[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ];
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( index !== name ) {
			props[ name ] = value;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">delete</span> props[ index ];
		}

		hooks = jQuery.cssHooks[ name ];
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( hooks &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-string">"expand"</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> hooks ) {
			value = hooks.expand( value );
			<span class="hljs-keyword">delete</span> props[ name ];

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-789" id="section-789"></a>
</div>
<p>Not quite $.extend, this won't overwrite existing keys.
Reusing 'index' because we have the correct &quot;name&quot;</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( index <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> value ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !( index <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> props ) ) {
					props[ index ] = value[ index ];
					specialEasing[ index ] = easing;
				}
			}
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			specialEasing[ name ] = easing;
		}
	}
}

        <td class="docs">

jQuery.Animation = jQuery.extend( Animation, {

	<span class="hljs-attr">tweeners</span>: {
		<span class="hljs-string">"*"</span>: [ <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> prop, value </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> tween = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.createTween( prop, value );
			adjustCSS( tween.elem, prop, rcssNum.exec( value ), tween );
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> tween;
		} ]
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">tweener</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> props, callback </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( isFunction( props ) ) {
			callback = props;
			props = [ <span class="hljs-string">"*"</span> ];
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			props = props.match( rnothtmlwhite );
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> prop,
			index = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
			length = props.length;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( ; index &lt; length; index++ ) {
			prop = props[ index ];
			Animation.tweeners[ prop ] = Animation.tweeners[ prop ] || [];
			Animation.tweeners[ prop ].unshift( callback );
		}
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">prefilters</span>: [ defaultPrefilter ],

	<span class="hljs-attr">prefilter</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> callback, prepend </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( prepend ) {
			Animation.prefilters.unshift( callback );
		} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
			Animation.prefilters.push( callback );
		}
	}
} );

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> opt = speed &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> speed === <span class="hljs-string">"object"</span> ? jQuery.extend( {}, speed ) : {

		<span class="hljs-attr">easing</span>: fn &amp;&amp; easing || easing &amp;&amp; !isFunction( easing ) &amp;&amp; easing
	};

	<span class="hljs-attr">stop</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> type, clearQueue, gotoEnd </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> stopQueue = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> hooks </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> stop = hooks.stop;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">delete</span> hooks.stop;
			stop( gotoEnd );
		};

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> type !== <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> ) {
			gotoEnd = clearQueue;
			clearQueue = type;
			type = <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span>;
		}

		}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> dequeue = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( index ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( data[ index ] &amp;&amp; data[ index ].stop ) {
					stopQueue( data[ index ] );
				}
			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( index <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> data ) {
					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( data[ index ] &amp;&amp; data[ index ].stop &amp;&amp; rrun.test( index ) ) {
						stopQueue( data[ index ] );
					}
				}
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( index = timers.length; index--; ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( timers[ index ].elem === <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> &amp;&amp;
					( type == <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> || timers[ index ].queue === type ) ) {

					timers[ index ].anim.stop( gotoEnd );
					dequeue = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
					timers.splice( index, <span class="hljs-number">1</span> );
				}
			}

      </tr>
    
      <tr>

        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( index = timers.length; index--; ) {

				}
			}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> cssFn = jQuery.fn[ name ];

			cssFn.apply( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span> ) :

	jQuery.fx.start();

		};

		<span class="hljs-attr">tabIndex</span>: {

        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-828" id="section-828"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: IE &lt;=9 - 11 only
elem.tabIndex doesn't always return the
correct value when it hasn't been explicitly set
https://web.archive.org/web/20141116233347/http://fluidproject.org/blog/2008/01/09/getting-setting-and-removing-tabindex-values-with-javascript/
Use proper attribute retrieval(#12072)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">				<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> tabindex = jQuery.find.attr( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"tabindex"</span> );

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( tabindex ) {
					<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( tabindex, <span class="hljs-number">10</span> );
				}

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (
					rfocusable.test( elem.nodeName ) ||
					rclickable.test( elem.nodeName ) &amp;&amp;
					elem.href
				) {
					<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
				}

				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-number">-1</span>;
			}
		}
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">propFix</span>: {
		<span class="hljs-string">"for"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"htmlFor"</span>,
		<span class="hljs-string">"class"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"className"</span>
	}
} );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-829" id="section-829"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: IE &lt;=11 only
Accessing the selectedIndex property
forces the browser to respect setting selected
on the option
The getter ensures a default option is selected
when in an optgroup
eslint rule &quot;no-unused-expressions&quot; is disabled for this code
since it considers such accessions noop</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !support.optSelected ) {
	jQuery.propHooks.selected = {
		<span class="hljs-attr">get</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{

			<span class="hljs-comment">/* eslint no-unused-expressions: "off" */</span>

			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> parent = elem.parentNode;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( parent &amp;&amp; parent.parentNode ) {
				parent.parentNode.selectedIndex;
			}
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>;
		},
		<span class="hljs-attr">set</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{

			<span class="hljs-comment">/* eslint no-unused-expressions: "off" */</span>

			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> parent = elem.parentNode;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( parent ) {
				parent.selectedIndex;

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( parent.parentNode ) {
					parent.parentNode.selectedIndex;
				}
			}
		}
	};
}

jQuery.each( [
	<span class="hljs-string">"tabIndex"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"readOnly"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"maxLength"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"cellSpacing"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"cellPadding"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"rowSpan"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"colSpan"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"useMap"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"frameBorder"</span>,
	<span class="hljs-string">"contentEditable"</span>
], <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
	jQuery.propFix[ <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.toLowerCase() ] = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;
} );




</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-830" id="section-830"></a>
</div>
<p>Strip and collapse whitespace according to HTML spec
https://infra.spec.whatwg.org/#strip-and-collapse-ascii-whitespace</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">stripAndCollapse</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> tokens = value.match( rnothtmlwhite ) || [];
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> tokens.join( <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> );
	}


<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">getClass</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem.getAttribute &amp;&amp; elem.getAttribute( <span class="hljs-string">"class"</span> ) || <span class="hljs-string">""</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">classesToArray</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-built_in">Array</span>.isArray( value ) ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value;
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> value === <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> value.match( rnothtmlwhite ) || [];
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> [];
}

jQuery.fn.extend( {
	<span class="hljs-attr">addClass</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> value </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> classes, elem, cur, curValue, clazz, j, finalValue,
			i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( isFunction( value ) ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> j </span>) </span>{
				jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ).addClass( value.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, j, getClass( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ) ) );
			} );
		}

		classes = classesToArray( value );

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( classes.length ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( ( elem = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ i++ ] ) ) {
				curValue = getClass( elem );
				cur = elem.nodeType === <span class="hljs-number">1</span> &amp;&amp; ( <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> + stripAndCollapse( curValue ) + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> );

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( cur ) {
					j = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
					<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( ( clazz = classes[ j++ ] ) ) {
						<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( cur.indexOf( <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> + clazz + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> ) &lt; <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ) {
							cur += clazz + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span>;
						}
					}

<p>If the element has a class name or if we're passed <code>false</code>,
then remove the whole classname (if there was one, the above saved it).
Otherwise bring back whatever was previously saved (if anything),
falling back to the empty string if nothing was stored.</p>

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.setAttribute ) {

						<span class="hljs-string">""</span> :
						dataPriv.get( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"__className__"</span> ) || <span class="hljs-string">""</span>
					);
				}
			}
		} );
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">hasClass</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> selector </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> className, elem,
			i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;

		className = <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> + selector + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span>;
		<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( ( elem = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ i++ ] ) ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( elem.nodeType === <span class="hljs-number">1</span> &amp;&amp;
				( <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> + stripAndCollapse( getClass( elem ) ) + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> ).indexOf( className ) &gt; <span class="hljs-number">-1</span> ) {
					<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
			}
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
	}
} );




<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> rreturn = <span class="hljs-regexp">/\r/g</span>;

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">						values.push( value );
					}
				}

				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> values;
			},

			<span class="hljs-attr">set</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem, value </span>) </span>{
				<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> optionSet, option,
					options = elem.options,
					values = jQuery.makeArray( value ),
					i = options.length;

				<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( i-- ) {
					option = options[ i ];

					<span class="hljs-comment">/* eslint-disable no-cond-assign */</span>

					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( option.selected =
						jQuery.inArray( jQuery.valHooks.option.get( option ), values ) &gt; <span class="hljs-number">-1</span>
					) {
						optionSet = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
					}

					<span class="hljs-comment">/* eslint-enable no-cond-assign */</span>
				}

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-862" id="section-862"></a>
</div>
<p>Determine event propagation path in advance, per W3C events spec (#9951)
Bubble up to document, then to window; watch for a global ownerDocument var (#9724)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !onlyHandlers &amp;&amp; !special.noBubble &amp;&amp; !isWindow( elem ) ) {

			bubbleType = special.delegateType || type;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !rfocusMorph.test( bubbleType + type ) ) {
				cur = cur.parentNode;
			}
			<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( ; cur; cur = cur.parentNode ) {
				eventPath.push( cur );
				tmp = cur;
			}

</pre>
        </td>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-871" id="section-871"></a>
</div>
<p>Piggyback on a donor event to simulate a different one
Used only for <code>focus(in | out)</code> events</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	simulate: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> type, elem, event </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> e = jQuery.extend(
			<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> jQuery.Event(),
			event,
			{
				<span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: type,
				<span class="hljs-attr">isSimulated</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
			}
		);

		jQuery.event.trigger( e, <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>, elem );
	}

} );

jQuery.fn.extend( {

	<span class="hljs-attr">trigger</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> type, data </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			jQuery.event.trigger( type, data, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		} );
	},
	<span class="hljs-attr">triggerHandler</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> type, data </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> elem = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ];
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( elem ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jQuery.event.trigger( type, data, elem, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );
		}
	}
} );


</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-872" id="section-872"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: Firefox &lt;=44
Firefox doesn't have focus(in | out) events
Related ticket - https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=687787</p>
<p>Support: Chrome &lt;=48 - 49, Safari &lt;=9.0 - 9.1
focus(in | out) events fire after focus &amp; blur events,
which is spec violation - http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events/#events-focusevent-event-order
Related ticket - https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=449857</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !support.focusin ) {
	jQuery.each( { <span class="hljs-attr">focus</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"focusin"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">blur</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"focusout"</span> }, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> orig, fix </span>) </span>{

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

			jQuery.event.simulate( fix, event.target, jQuery.event.fix( event ) );
		};

		jQuery.event.special[ fix ] = {

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-874" id="section-874"></a>
</div>
<p>Handle: regular nodes (via <code>this.ownerDocument</code>), window
(via <code>this.document</code>) &amp; document (via <code>this</code>).</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">				<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> doc = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.ownerDocument || <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.document || <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>,
					attaches = dataPriv.access( doc, fix );

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !attaches ) {
					doc.addEventListener( orig, handler, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );
				}
				dataPriv.access( doc, fix, ( attaches || <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ) + <span class="hljs-number">1</span> );
			},
			<span class="hljs-attr">teardown</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
				<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> doc = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.ownerDocument || <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.document || <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>,
					attaches = dataPriv.access( doc, fix ) - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;

				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !attaches ) {
					doc.removeEventListener( orig, handler, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );
					dataPriv.remove( doc, fix );

				} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
					dataPriv.access( doc, fix, attaches );
				}
			}
		};
	} );
}
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> location = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.location;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> nonce = { <span class="hljs-attr">guid</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">Date</span>.now() };

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> xml;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !data || <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> data !== <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>;

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-876" id="section-876"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: IE 9 - 11 only

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> {
		xml = ( <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.DOMParser() ).parseFromString( data, <span class="hljs-string">"text/xml"</span> );
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> ( e ) {
		xml = <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span>;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !xml || xml.getElementsByTagName( <span class="hljs-string">"parsererror"</span> ).length ) {
		jQuery.error( <span class="hljs-string">"Invalid XML: "</span> + data );
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> xml;
};


<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span>
	rbracket = <span class="hljs-regexp">/\[\]$/</span>,
	rCRLF = <span class="hljs-regexp">/\r?\n/g</span>,
	rsubmitterTypes = <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(?:submit|button|image|reset|file)$/i</span>,
	rsubmittable = <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(?:input|select|textarea|keygen)/i</span>;

	}

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-890" id="section-890"></a>

<p>#7653, #8125, #8152: local protocol detection</p>

        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	rlocalProtocol = <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(?:about|app|app-storage|.+-extension|file|res|widget):$/</span>,
	rnoContent = <span class="hljs-regexp">/^(?:GET|HEAD)$/</span>,

      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-891" id="section-891"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Prefilters</p>
<ol>
<li>They are useful to introduce custom dataTypes (see ajax/jsonp.js for an example)</li>
<li>These are called:
<ul>
<li>BEFORE asking for a transport</li>
<li>AFTER param serialization (s.data is a string if s.processData is true)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>key is the dataType</li>
<li>the catchall symbol &quot;*&quot; can be used</li>
<li>execution will start with transport dataType and THEN continue down to &quot;*&quot; if needed</li>
</ol>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	prefilters = {},

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-892" id="section-892"></a>
</div>
<div class="dox">
<div class="summary">
<p>Transports bindings</p>
<ol>
<li>key is the dataType</li>
<li>the catchall symbol &quot;*&quot; can be used</li>
<li>selection will start with transport dataType and THEN go to &quot;*&quot; if needed</li>
</ol>
</div>
<div class="body">
</div>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	transports = {},

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-893" id="section-893"></a>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	allTypes = <span class="hljs-string">"*/"</span>.concat( <span class="hljs-string">"*"</span> ),

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-900" id="section-900"></a>
</div>
<p>Base inspection function for prefilters and transports</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">inspectPrefiltersOrTransports</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> structure, options, originalOptions, jqXHR </span>) </span>{

	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> inspected = {},
		seekingTransport = ( structure === transports );

	<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">inspect</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> dataType </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> selected;
		inspected[ dataType ] = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
		jQuery.each( structure[ dataType ] || [], <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> _, prefilterOrFactory </span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> dataTypeOrTransport = prefilterOrFactory( options, originalOptions, jqXHR );
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> dataTypeOrTransport === <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> &amp;&amp;
				!seekingTransport &amp;&amp; !inspected[ dataTypeOrTransport ] ) {

				options.dataTypes.unshift( dataTypeOrTransport );
				inspect( dataTypeOrTransport );
				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( seekingTransport ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> !( selected = dataTypeOrTransport );
			}
		} );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> selected;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> inspect( options.dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] ) || !inspected[ <span class="hljs-string">"*"</span> ] &amp;&amp; inspect( <span class="hljs-string">"*"</span> );
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-901" id="section-901"></a>
</div>
<p>A special extend for ajax options
that takes &quot;flat&quot; options (not to be deep extended)
Fixes #9887</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">ajaxExtend</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> target, src </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> key, deep,
		flatOptions = jQuery.ajaxSettings.flatOptions || {};

	<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( key <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> src ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( src[ key ] !== <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span> ) {
			( flatOptions[ key ] ? target : ( deep || ( deep = {} ) ) )[ key ] = src[ key ];
		}
	}
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( deep ) {
		jQuery.extend( <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>, target, deep );
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> target;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-902" id="section-902"></a>
</div>

		dataTypes = s.dataTypes;

        <td class="docs">

          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] === <span class="hljs-string">"*"</span> ) {
		dataTypes.shift();
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ct === <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span> ) {
			ct = s.mimeType || jqXHR.getResponseHeader( <span class="hljs-string">"Content-Type"</span> );
		}
	}

        </td>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-904" id="section-904"></a>
</div>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( ct ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( type <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> contents ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( contents[ type ] &amp;&amp; contents[ type ].test( ct ) ) {
				dataTypes.unshift( type );
				<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
			}
		}
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-905" id="section-905"></a>
</div>
<p>Check to see if we have a response for the expected dataType</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> responses ) {
		finalDataType = dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ];
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-906" id="section-906"></a>
</div>
<p>Try convertible dataTypes</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> ( type <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> responses ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] || s.converters[ type + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> + dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] ] ) {
				finalDataType = type;
				<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
			}
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !firstDataType ) {
				firstDataType = type;
			}
		}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-907" id="section-907"></a>
</div>
<p>Or just use first one</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		finalDataType = finalDataType || firstDataType;
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-908" id="section-908"></a>
</div>
<p>If we found a dataType
We add the dataType to the list if needed
and return the corresponding response</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( finalDataType ) {
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( finalDataType !== dataTypes[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] ) {
			dataTypes.unshift( finalDataType );
		}
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> responses[ finalDataType ];
	}
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

						response = conv( response );
					} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
						<span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> {
							response = conv( response );
						} <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> ( e ) {
							<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {
								<span class="hljs-attr">state</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"parsererror"</span>,
								<span class="hljs-attr">error</span>: conv ? e : <span class="hljs-string">"No conversion from "</span> + prev + <span class="hljs-string">" to "</span> + current
							};
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> { <span class="hljs-attr">state</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"success"</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">data</span>: response };

<p>Context for global events is callbackContext if it is a DOM node or jQuery collection</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			globalEventContext = s.context &amp;&amp;
				( callbackContext.nodeType || callbackContext.jquery ) ?
					jQuery( callbackContext ) :
					jQuery.event,

</pre>
        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">				getResponseHeader: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> key </span>) </span>{
					<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> match;
					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( completed ) {
						<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !responseHeaders ) {
							responseHeaders = {};
							<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( ( match = rheaders.exec( responseHeadersString ) ) ) {
								responseHeaders[ match[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ].toLowerCase() + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> ] =
									( responseHeaders[ match[ <span class="hljs-number">1</span> ].toLowerCase() + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> ] || [] )
										.concat( match[ <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ] );
							}
						}
						match = responseHeaders[ key.toLowerCase() + <span class="hljs-string">" "</span> ];
					}
					<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> match == <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> ? <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> : match.join( <span class="hljs-string">", "</span> );
				},

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

							requestHeadersNames[ name.toLowerCase() ] || name;

					<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( transport ) {
						transport.abort( finalText );
					}
					done( <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, finalText );
					<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;
				}
			};

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-991" id="section-991"></a>
</div>
<p>Abort if not done already and return</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jqXHR.abort();
		}

        </td>

			s.contentType = s.headers[ i ] || <span class="hljs-string">""</span>;
		}
	}

		},
