			jQuery.globalEval( response, options, doc );
		}
	} );
};


jQuery.fn.extend( {
	<span class="hljs-attr">wrapAll</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> html </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> wrap;

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( isFunction( html ) ) {
				html = html.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] );
			}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1026" id="section-1026"></a>
</div>
<p>The elements to wrap the target around</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">			wrap = jQuery( html, <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ].ownerDocument ).eq( <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ).clone( <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ].parentNode ) {
				wrap.insertBefore( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>[ <span class="hljs-number">0</span> ] );
			}

			wrap.map( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
				<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> elem = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;

				<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( elem.firstElementChild ) {
					elem = elem.firstElementChild;
				}

				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem;
			} ).append( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> );
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">wrapInner</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> html </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( isFunction( html ) ) {
			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> i </span>) </span>{
				jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ).wrapInner( html.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, i ) );
			} );
		}

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> self = jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ),
				contents = self.contents();

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( contents.length ) {
				contents.wrapAll( html );

			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
				self.append( html );
			}
		} );
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">wrap</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> html </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> htmlIsFunction = isFunction( html );

		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> i </span>) </span>{
			jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ).wrapAll( htmlIsFunction ? html.call( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>, i ) : html );
		} );
	},

	<span class="hljs-attr">unwrap</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> selector </span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.parent( selector ).not( <span class="hljs-string">"body"</span> ).each( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			jQuery( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span> ).replaceWith( <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.childNodes );
		} );
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>;
	}
} );


jQuery.expr.pseudos.hidden = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> !jQuery.expr.pseudos.visible( elem );
};
jQuery.expr.pseudos.visible = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> elem </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> !!( elem.offsetWidth || elem.offsetHeight || elem.getClientRects().length );
};

	} <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> ( e ) {}

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1032" id="section-1032"></a>
</div>
<p>X-Requested-With header
For cross-domain requests, seeing as conditions for a preflight are
akin to a jigsaw puzzle, we simply never set it to be sure.
(it can always be set on a per-request basis or even using ajaxSetup)
For same-domain requests, won't change header if already provided.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">				<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( !options.crossDomain &amp;&amp; !headers[ <span class="hljs-string">"X-Requested-With"</span> ] ) {
					headers[ <span class="hljs-string">"X-Requested-With"</span> ] = <span class="hljs-string">"XMLHttpRequest"</span>;
				}

</pre>
        </td>

        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1067" id="section-1067"></a>
</div>
<p>Support: Safari 8 only
In Safari 8 documents created via document.implementation.createHTMLDocument
collapse sibling forms: the second one becomes a child of the first one.
Because of that, this security measure has to be disabled in Safari 8.
https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=137337</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">support.createHTMLDocument = ( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> body = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.implementation.createHTMLDocument( <span class="hljs-string">""</span> ).body;
	body.innerHTML = <span class="hljs-string">"&lt;form&gt;&lt;/form&gt;&lt;form&gt;&lt;/form&gt;"</span>;
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> body.childNodes.length === <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
} )();


</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( options.left != <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> ) {

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( jQuery.css( elem, <span class="hljs-string">"position"</span> ) === <span class="hljs-string">"fixed"</span> ) {

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1092" id="section-1092"></a>

<p>Account for the <em>real</em> offset parent, which can be the document or its root element
when a statically positioned element is identified</p>

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">			doc = elem.ownerDocument;

      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">

      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1095" id="section-1095"></a>
</div>
<p>This method will return documentElement in the following cases:</p>
<ol>
<li>For the element inside the iframe without offsetParent, this method will return
documentElement of the parent window</li>
<li>For the hidden or detached element</li>
<li>For body or html element, i.e. in case of the html node - it will return itself</li>
</ol>
<p>but those exceptions were never presented as a real life use-cases
and might be considered as more preferable results.</p>
<p>This logic, however, is not guaranteed and can change at any point in the future</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	offsetParent: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.map( <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> offsetParent = <span class="hljs-keyword">this</span>.offsetParent;

			<span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> ( offsetParent &amp;&amp; jQuery.css( offsetParent, <span class="hljs-string">"position"</span> ) === <span class="hljs-string">"static"</span> ) {
				offsetParent = offsetParent.offsetParent;
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> offsetParent || documentElement;
		} );
	}
} );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

        </td>

          <pre class="javascript">			<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> win;
			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( isWindow( elem ) ) {
				win = elem;
			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( elem.nodeType === <span class="hljs-number">9</span> ) {
				win = elem.defaultView;
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( val === <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span> ) {
				<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> win ? win[ prop ] : elem[ method ];
			}

			<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( win ) {
				win.scrollTo(
					!top ? val : win.pageXOffset,
					top ? val : win.pageYOffset
				);

			} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
				elem[ method ] = val;
			}
		}, method, val, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>.length );
	};
} );

</pre>

      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1110" id="section-1110"></a>

arguments.
jQuery.proxy is deprecated to promote standards (specifically Function#bind)
However, it is not slated for removal any time soon</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">jQuery.proxy = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> fn, context </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> tmp, args, proxy;

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> context === <span class="hljs-string">"string"</span> ) {
		tmp = fn[ context ];
		context = fn;
		fn = tmp;
	}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>

		jQuery.readyWait++;
	} <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> {
		jQuery.ready( <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> );

        <td class="docs">

  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1115" id="section-1115"></a>

subtraction forces infinities to NaN</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">		!<span class="hljs-built_in">isNaN</span>( obj - <span class="hljs-built_in">parseFloat</span>( obj ) );
};

jQuery.trim = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> text </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> text == <span class="hljs-literal">null</span> ?
		<span class="hljs-string">""</span> :
		( text + <span class="hljs-string">""</span> ).replace( rtrim, <span class="hljs-string">""</span> );
};



</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1116" id="section-1116"></a>
</div>
<p>Register as a named AMD module, since jQuery can be concatenated with other
files that may use define, but not via a proper concatenation script that
understands anonymous AMD modules. A named AMD is safest and most robust
way to register. Lowercase jquery is used because AMD module names are
derived from file names, and jQuery is normally delivered in a lowercase
file name. Do this after creating the global so that if an AMD module wants
to call noConflict to hide this version of jQuery, it will work.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">
</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1117" id="section-1117"></a>
</div>
<p>Note that for maximum portability, libraries that are not jQuery should
declare themselves as anonymous modules, and avoid setting a global if an
AMD loader is present. jQuery is a special case. For more information, see
https://github.com/jrburke/requirejs/wiki/Updating-existing-libraries#wiki-anon</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> define === <span class="hljs-string">"function"</span> &amp;&amp; define.amd ) {
	define( <span class="hljs-string">"jquery"</span>, [], <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>{
		<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jQuery;
	} );
}




<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span>

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1118" id="section-1118"></a>
</div>
<p>Map over jQuery in case of overwrite</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	_jQuery = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.jQuery,

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1119" id="section-1119"></a>
</div>
<p>Map over the $ in case of overwrite</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript">	_$ = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.$;

jQuery.noConflict = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"> deep </span>) </span>{
	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.$ === jQuery ) {
		<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.$ = _$;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( deep &amp;&amp; <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.jQuery === jQuery ) {
		<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.jQuery = _jQuery;
	}

	<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jQuery;
};

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1120" id="section-1120"></a>
</div>
<p>Expose jQuery and $ identifiers, even in AMD
(#7102#comment:10, https://github.com/jquery/jquery/pull/557)
and CommonJS for browser emulators (#13566)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ( <span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> noGlobal === <span class="hljs-string">"undefined"</span> ) {
	<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.jQuery = <span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.$ = jQuery;
}




<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> jQuery;
} );

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
